00037 #include "NodeMap.hpp"
00038 #include "Exception.hpp"
00039 
00040 
00042 // Implementation
00044 
00045 
00046 NodeMap::NodeMap(unsigned size)
00047     : mIsIdentity(true)
00048 {
00049     mMap.resize(size);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void NodeMap::Resize(unsigned size)
00053 {
00054     mMap.resize(size);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void NodeMap::ResetToIdentity()
00058 {
00059     for (unsigned index=0; index<mMap.size(); index++)
00060     {
00061         mMap[index] = index;  // This is needed if we later diverge from identity (e.g. delete nodes)
00062     }
00063     mIsIdentity = true;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void NodeMap::SetNewIndex(unsigned oldIndex, unsigned newIndex)
00067 {
00068     mMap[oldIndex] = newIndex;
00069     if (mIsIdentity && (oldIndex != newIndex))
00070     {
00071         mIsIdentity = false;
00072     }
00073 }
00074 
00075 void NodeMap::SetDeleted(unsigned index)
00076 {
00077     mMap[index] = UINT_MAX;
00078     mIsIdentity = false;
00079 }
00080 
00081 bool NodeMap::IsDeleted(unsigned index)
00082 {
00083     return (mMap[index] == UINT_MAX);
00084 }
00085 
00086 unsigned NodeMap::GetNewIndex(unsigned oldIndex) const
00087 {
00088     if (mIsIdentity)
00089     {
00090         return oldIndex;
00091     }
00092     if (mMap[oldIndex] == UINT_MAX)
00093     {
00094         EXCEPTION("Node has been deleted");
00095     }
00096     return mMap[oldIndex];
00097 }
00098 
00099 bool NodeMap::IsIdentityMap()
00100 {
00101     return mIsIdentity;
00102 }
00103 
00104 unsigned NodeMap::GetSize()
00105 {
00106     return mMap.size();
00107 }
